        boolean intersectsBox(BoundingBox box,
                      TempVars vars)
        Parameters:
        box - the BoundingBox to test for intersection
        vars - storage for temporary data
        Returns:

      • intersectsFrustum

        boolean intersectsFrustum(Camera camera,
                          TempVars vars)
        Parameters:
        camera - the Camera whose frustum will be tested for intersection
        vars - storage for temporary data
        Returns:
        true if the area and the frustum intersect, otherwise false
        See Also:
        Light.intersectsFrustum(Camera, TempVars)
